name: Ducks Game
description:
Ducks Game

Keyboard Controls:

Run: Left and Right, Jump: C or Space , Attack or jump on Cane: X

Gamepad is also supported. (XBox Controller)

Run: D-Pad, Jump: A,  Attack or jump on Cane: X or B

This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam Week 50. The Theme was "Remake a Classic". It is a Remake of the Gameboy game "Duck Tales".

@Game_Quester

Music and SFX by Matt Patrick Walsh
